public class CustomerStatementReport extends Report
Class representing a customer statement report.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerStatementReport

      public CustomerStatementReport(Customer customer, List<Transaction> transactions, BigDecimal openingBalance, BigDecimal closingBalance, LocalDate periodStart, LocalDate periodEnd)
      Constructor initializing the customer statement report with specified values.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer for whom the statement is generated
      transactions - the list of transactions included in the statement
      openingBalance - the opening balance at the start of the statement period
      closingBalance - the closing balance at the end of the statement period
      periodStart - the start date of the statement period
      periodEnd - the end date of the statement period
